name: Door Between Worlds
description:
This 2D Action Platformer follows the main character Atticus. Atticus is a citizen of Lyndia which was under attack 5 years ago. Atticus failed to protect his home in time and was the only one left standing. After his defeat he left to live in the mountains until one day when Oswald the evil king opened the door between worlds and let all the demons out. Before the world ends Atticus must muster his strength to close the doors and save the world.


Controls:
WASD = Move

Space bar = Jump

Space bar in the air = Double jump

F = Fire your air slice

Hold Shift = Sprint
